doc.title: Drive-In - The Movie
doc.plot: Jack and Wang dropped out of med school to make movies, but as graduation approaches, all they have to show for it are a mountain of debt and some really bad student films. With "borrowed" money from Wang's family, they enter a film contest whose grand prize could put them on the Hollywood fast track and prove to their parents that they're not failures. Of course, they still have to make a movie.
